headline: Fuji Soft founding family affirms support for Bain's $2 billion hostile takeover bid
summary: The founding family of Japanese IT firm Fuji Soft on Wednesday reiterated its support for a takeover bid by private equity firm Bain Capital that is opposed by Fuji Soft's board, it said in a...

headline: Is KKR & Co. (KKR) Poised to Weather Any Macroeconomic Environment?
summary: RiverPark Advisors, an investment advisory firm and sponsor of the RiverPark family of mutual funds, released its “RiverPark Large Growth Fund” third quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. During the third quarter, the markets performed strongly with the Russell 1000 Growth Index (RLG) and the S&P 500 index returning 3.19% […]

headline: An 8% Discount Or $625 In Premium: Two Ways This KKR Stock Option Trade Wins
summary: KKR has been a strong performer this year, rising 82% year-to-date.  With KKR stock pulling back to the 50-day moving average, it could provide a nice entry point for investors.  KKR is a leading global investment firm specializing in private equity, energy, infrastructure, real estate, and credit strategies.

headline: Short-Term Loans Get Just What They Need: A Long-Term Commitment
summary: It may be no surprise that people are eager to put off paying in full for their holiday shopping.  Increasingly, there is an answer: private credit.  Buy now, pay later provider  Affirm  last week announced a $4 billion commitment for lending from investment firm Sixth Street.

headline: Bain to Make $4.2 Billion Hostile Bid for Fuji Soft Against KKR
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Bain Capital plans to make a bid to buy shares of Japanese software company Fuji Soft Inc. without support from the company’s board of directors, kicking off a rare hostile bid in Japan against KKR & Co. Most Read from BloombergHow California Sees the World, and ItselfLondon’s Tube Fares Are Set to Rise by 4.6% Next YearThe Boston-based investment firm disclosed the plans in a presentation Wednesday after Fuji Soft’s board rejected a higher offer from Bain in favor of going privat
